summary: CAM SHAFT POSITION SENOR SENDING  SENOR SIGNALS TO ENGINE.   *BF THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALERSHIP IN THE AREA TO PERFORM THE RECALL.
